name: Golden Triangle Tour With Goa
description:
Indulge yourself with the very best of eclectic India. Our tour offers a myriad of thrilling experiences. On one hand, head to the capital of Delhi where you unravel fascinating sites such as the majestic Red Fort, historical Qutab Minar and a lot more. Post that, get a taste of royalty and opulence at Jaipur. It is here you also get to revel in the vibrant hues of the culture.

The tour also offers a visit to Agra, the land of architectural marvels. For a befitting end, head to breezy and groovy Goa. Bask by the hippie sandy beaches such as Anjuna and Baga, party the night away Tito’s and experience tranquillity at the age old quaint Portuguese churches.
